title: OpenAI acquires Global Illumination
summary: OpenAI has acquired the team at Global Illumination, a company known for leveraging AI to build creative tools and digital experiences. The team, which includes founders Thomas Dimson, Taylor Gordon, and Joey Flynn, has joined OpenAI to work on core products like ChatGPT. With their previous experience at companies like Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, Google, Pixar, and Riot Games, the team is expected to make a significant impact at OpenAI.
